content: Celestial Ribbon is one of the rarest materials in Black Myth: Wukong. It is used for some of the highest upgrades in the game to turn gear and weapons into Mythical gear or craft new Mythical Gear.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Celestial_Ribbon.md', within the main section titled 'Celestial Ribbon'.
The content is as follows:
Celestial Ribbon is one of the rarest materials in Black Myth: Wukong. It is used for some of the highest upgrades in the game to turn gear and weapons into Mythical gear or craft new Mythical Gear.
